EmailTemplate.name: MBO Partners Inquiry (1323705294.0)
EmailTemplate.subject: MBO Partners Inquiry (1323705294.0)
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
1024x768 Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE MicrosoftInternetExplorer4 Dear Kevin,
You had recently shared your phone information with MBO Partners, and as a courtesy, I wanted to follow up on the voicemail I left you. I wanted to introduce myself as the person at MBO Partners responsible for all new associate and partnership requests. I am including my contact information. And, so you may easily book a time that is convenient for you, I am including a link to my online schedule: https://my.timedriver.com/9TGRK
You can also watch a short video about who we are on youtube: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=zKDzwSTmGv4&hd=1.
You may also look at some of the stories from indepdenents who use MBO Partners: http://info.mbopartners.com/meet-the-independents.html
I look forward to speaking with you, have a great day!
Thank you, Nicolette
___________________________________ Nicolette Taylor Consultant Services Advisor MBO Partners
t: 703.793.6281 f: 703.793.6456 e: ntaylor@mbopartners.com w: www.mbopartners.com
Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed. If you have received this email in error please notify postmaster@mbopartners.com and permanently delete the e-mail and files.
